reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It sounded way too expensive the first time I bought it, but a little of this stuff really goes a long way so it'll last you a surprisingly long time. It's also just a more smooth, comfortable experience than other shaving creams I've used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2010
reviews.reviewText: Yes one word to describe this product "WOW"! All my life I have shaved with some form of goop from a can called "Shaving Gel". My friend, you know nothing of shaving until you actually break out a Badger Brush and lather your own "Shaving Cream" and spread it on your face. It felt nice and heavy and so smooth on my face with just a little bit of cream I was able to form Shaving Cream Nirvana! Hands down it was the best shave of my life!Normally when I use the goop I am only able to get maybe one pass with my Mach III razor, as I have very sensitive skin. Then I try and go over the ruff spots but not too much as it starts hurting. I was able to get not one, not two, but three passes with this cream and my Mach III. Normally my skin is red, bumpy and irritated and probably bleeding if I dare try for just 2 passes with the old goop, but not the case with this quality cream. Yes this stuff works, and it was worth every penny. Even my wife was impressed on how close of a shave I had.Now I am still learning this whole wet shaving technique as this was my first go around. But from what I have learned from Badger & Blade, and Manic59 all found on google I am never going back to the goop. Later this week my Double Edge Razor will be my in my hand and my hopes, are it will be just as great of an experience. If so my Mach III will be bouncing off the rim of my trash can as did my almost full can of "Shaving Gel" aka the goop.One last thought is take my words with a grain of salt. This was the first go I have ever had at a wet shave, I may have had just as wonderful of a shave with a soap or some other cream. The person that told me to try this out also has sensitive skin and said this is the best stuff. I also heard the same story from others listing off multiple brands of products. But if you are looking to make a change from goop to a real Shaving Cream you will not, and I mean WILL NOT be disappointed. I love this stuff, but it begs the question, if this cream is this good, what else is out there to shave with that maybe even better?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only shaving cream I use because it doesn’t irritate my skin. Also, less bumps compared to before. Great buy, has made my life easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricy, but Great shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I shave my both my face and whole head, so I wanted some decent products to do so comfortably. I started off with e-shave, which I did like but it was expensive so I thought I would try some other "upscale" shave products of similar price to see if there were any I liked better. I tried the Musgo Real from Portugal as it had such rave reviews and was pretty disappointed (skip it). Did not like the scent and it was not a rich a cream as e-shave. I am not one of those guys who is obsessed with getting a "BBS" (baby butt smooth) shave, but I do want something that is good quality.I tried the Art of Shave (first a trial size of the Sandalwood scent which I did not like the smell) then went with the unscented larger size as the cream itself seemed good.My thoughts are:Pros:- No discernible scent- Nice thick lather- Need a very small amount for good coverage- Provides a very smooth, comfortable shave- Rinses clean away with no scent or residue on your skinCons:- Kinda pricy, but so were the other options.Overall, this is a really good shaving cream and I am equally happy with it as I am with the e-Shave.NOTE: Do not bother with the Pre-Shave Oil. It does not add much to the shave quality, does have a scent (even the unscented version), and leaves a goopy residue.Hope you found this helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works very well
reviews.reviewText: This shave is just great but just a bit expensive I will keep ordering anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used to buy this from the art of shaving that’s the name of this product. It’s excellent shave cream. You can get a good month out of a little thing like that and most or all of the stores have closed so when I used my last one up, I went to Amazon and Bam there was, so I bought a couple, so I’m in good shape I’ll be clean shaven and ready to rock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but the best you can buy.
reviews.reviewText: I use it sparingly because it's expensive but it can last a long time. My favorite shaving cream hands down and I've tried like 50.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've found my new shaving cream.
reviews.reviewText: Wanna get all classy and old-school with those badger fur shaving cream applicators? Well this product will be the Bonnie to your Clyde! If you don't have one, I suppose your paws will do. Definitely worth the gratuity tokens you'll spend for this.

As always fast shipping and good packaging. Once I open the package cream spread on the lid and I feel like old stock. Any how smooth cream and I like it. This is first time that I bought this product. Price is expensive.

Es ist immer dasselbe: kaum hat man ein Produkt gefunden, das voll überzeugt und das man für den Rest seines Lebens nutzen will, schon ist es nicht mehr lieferbar.Doch, ist es: Kauf und Versand über Amazon USA funktionierten bei mir reibungslos.

When I opened this the first time I thought "oh yuk" - the cream kind of messily in this container.But actually this is excellent non-allergenic great lathering cream. Definitely will be buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Great for both girls legs too!
reviews.reviewText: So, awkward comments coming up, I'm a girl and I use this product to shave my legs.I have very sensitive skin and struggled finding shaving creams that work for me. This stuff it brilliant. You only need a little.Would definitely buy again

J'ai découvert cette marque et ce produit lors d'un séjour à Las Vegas et suis tombé amoureux de cette crème à raser. Ayant la peau sensible, c'est le premier produit de rasage qui ne me provoque aucune (ou presque aucune) irritation. Il n'y a pas d'odeur ce que je trouve également agréable. Le seul inconvénient est que, étant Suisse, je dois faire venir le produit des US, mais cela ne pose plus de problème avec Amazon et ses moyens d'approvisionnement efficaces :)Je conseille d'utiliser ce produit avec un blaireau. J'ai fait dernièrement l'acquisition du blaireau suivant (lien: Edwin Jagger - 1EJ946SDS - Blaireau traditionnel anglais - Imitation ébène - Support - Noir - Taille M ). Il fait son travail à merveille et perd peu de poils.Achetez cette crème à raser les yeux fermés, vous aurez pour votre argent: 1 pot par année en se rasant 4-5x par semaine!
